page.title: 01Our Domesday Block
page.content: Our Domesday block This block is covered mainly by farmland.In the centre of the block thereis a village called Folksworth.It has a little shop called "Usave"and is run by Jack Sing.There is a pub called"The Fox" and it is run by Fred Seaton.There is also a little school with three class rooms.The head master is Mr Shannon.Towards the bottomof the block there is a village called Caldecote.There are 9 or 10 houses.There is also a village called Washingley, there are two house there. At the top right corner of this block there is a large round_a_bout called Norman Cross.The Norman Cross round_a_bout is on the Great North Road.The block contains three old churches at Folksworth,at Stilton and at Caldecote.There are two schools in the block.
